title: Ruining Zoe Skins
body: I overheard that rito is nerfing Zoe yet again. People don't like her I get it, however I read that one of these planned nerfs is to get rid of Sleepy Trouble Bubbles 'trap on the ground'. I personally really enjoy the aesthetic look of the sleepy trouble bubbles 'trap' especially in the pool party skin, in fact that's what sold it for me. If I knew this was gonna happen I would have never bought the pool party Zoe skin let alone the chroma pack with it.
